title: I'm recording my Gold Promo's. SHould I do Full games or cut them?
body:
I've done it before when I first reached gold -
( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D4RQybEwpUs&list=PLyCEt27AsZusDqA5hp8hnF480-30FXRAi )
And now that I have stable internet again I've been playing and practicing more.
I did my Provisionals ages ago and got placed in Silver 1, but I could not play anymore as internet was shockingly bad.

But for the most part, its A - OK.

So, Full games? (So you guys can laugh at my misery)
or try and Cut the games, and only have the 1 v 1's - team fights etc.
